long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Spanish Vocab: Your Simple Path to Spanish Mastery
Boost your Spanish vocabulary with ease! This streamlined Chrome extension delivers:

10 new Spanish-to-English word translations daily
Clean, distraction-free interface
Automatic updates - no effort required

Expand your Spanish knowledge effortlessly as you browse. Perfect for beginners and intermediate learners looking for consistent, bite-sized language practice.
